body: Castillo de San Marcos as a Classroom From historic weapon demos to live Internet programs, Castillo de San Marcos NM provides learning adventures for students and teachers throughout the the world. Come explore!   Parks as Classrooms: Field trips, lesson plans, and in-school outreach programs   Professional Development: Opportunities for teachers   Distance Learning: Internet-based educational programs (Coming Soon!)   Additional Resources: Photos, videos, websites, and more (Coming Soon!)
title: Castillo de San Marcos National Monument: Education
